title: suggestion
body: can you make it to where if you have duel monitors with extended display that the cursor doesn't leave the screen? having to constantly disable one of the monitors just so i can play properly is highly annoying.

replies.body:
If you're playing in fullscreen, the window should prevent the mouse from leaving the league window. Let's first make sure you're running league in fullscreen for that to work. 

If that doesn't help, the focus of your monitors may have somehow been messed up. If your mouse jumps to the other screen, try alt+tabbing to get the focus back onto league. 

Let me know if either of those options helped!
